name: Saint Veronika
wikiSummary: According to the Saint Veronika Songfacts, this song was inspired by Veronika Decides To Die, a novel by Paulo Coelho, which guitarist Ian D'Sa read.
wikiText: According to the Saint Veronika Songfacts, this song was inspired by Veronika Decides To Die, a novel by Paulo Coelho, which guitarist Ian D'Sa read. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
